sentences.english: You are real pal. I'll call now to set up an interview.
sentences.chinese: 你真够朋友，我现在就打电话约定面试。

sentences.english: Cahill, the guard assigned to that shift, was friendly .
sentences.chinese: 被派换班的警卫卡西尔很够朋友。

sentences.english: The only way to have a friend is to be one.
sentences.chinese: 交友的唯一办法就是自己够朋友。

sentences.english: You did not come out to support [remained aloof]. That was a friendly attitude.
sentences.chinese: 你对此事没有表态，够朋友。

sentences.english: Sinking in the sand, he reached for his friend's hand, but it was too far away.
sentences.chinese: 陷进沙子里的他伸手去够朋友的手，但是离得太远了。

sentences.english: The only way to have a frend is to be one.
sentences.chinese: 交朋友的唯一方法是自己要够朋友。

sentences.english: I do know he is sort of a friend to my father.
sentences.chinese: 我只知道，他对我爸爸实在够朋友。

sentences.english: I should say Li Na is a true pal and a good girl.
sentences.chinese: 我应该说一句，李娜不仅够朋友，还是个好女孩儿。
